EmailTemplate.name: Manage costs while you take advantage of the Egg Market Boom (1561604161.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Manage costs while you take advantage of the Egg Market Boom (1561604161.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Jason, The global egg market is expected to grow rapidly into 2023. How has Burnbrae positioned itself to take advantage? I know that when we last left off, we didn't have an opportunity to meet and understand your business completely. Indirect spend can quickly become a category that gets mismanaged. However, when addressed appropriately it can become a source of significant cost reduction and efficiency. Grand & Toy can be the perfect partner to help you manage indirect spend. We're currently partnered with Hylife Farms and have helped them navigate the ups and downs of the commercial agriculture. I'd like to set up a meeting with you to discuss what benefits of a partnership with G&T would mean for Burnbrae. Are you available on July 10th at 1pm? If this time does not work, please suggest an alternate. Looking forward to meeting you Jason.
